memberdef.argsstring: (self, exposure, width, height, xoffset, yoffset, numdevice=0, framespersec=None, external_trigger=False, data_format=0)
memberdef.name: __init__

memberdef.argsstring: (self, exposure=10000, width=2048, height=2048, xoffset=0, yoffset=0, gain=0)
memberdef.name: new

para.verbatim: this method opens the ximea device. Ximea devices start at 1100. 1100 => device 0, 1101 => device 1 And return a camera object
This method get a frame on the selected camera and return a ndarray If the camera breaks down, it reinitializes it, and tries again.
This method close properly the frame grabber It releases the allocated memory and stops the acquisition
this method changes the exposure of the camera and set the exposure attribute
this method changes the exposure of the camera and set the exposure attribute
